mapper.select:
select
from tbl_iam_project
and "display_name" like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and "enable"=#{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and bp_id=#{bpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (parent_id is null or parent_id = '')
and "status" = 1
order by create_time desc

INSERT INTO tbl_iam_project( id, name, display_name, description, status, enable, parent_id, create_time, update_time, bp_id, user_id, type )VALUES
( #{element.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{element.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{element.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{element.bpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.type,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select:
WITH RECURSIVE dict AS ( SELECT * FROM tbl_iam_project
and id in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
union ALL SELECT tbl_iam_project.* FROM tbl_iam_project, dict WHERE tbl_iam_project.parent_id = dict.id ) SELECT * FROM dict order by create_time desc
